p: Anisakis simplex L3 larvae were isolated from the intermediary host Micromesistius poutassou (Risso) (blue whiting) purchased from the fishmonger in Villanueva de Gállego (Zaragoza, Spain). The worms were washed several times on sterile solution of 0.9% NaCl and identified under light microscope according to morphological features. Only larvae with length > 2.0 cm were used for the larvicidal assays.
